mapper.select: select * from event where product like concat(concat('%', #{product}),'%')
select * from event where category like concat(concat('%', #{category}),'%')
mapper.update: update event set product = #{product}, detail = #{detail}, open_date = #{open_date}, end_date = #{end_date}, win_num = #{win_num}, price = #{price}, gender = #{gender}, age = #{age}, category = #{category} where event_id = #{event_id}
update event set join_num = join_num + 1 where event_id = #{event_id}
mapper.select: select a.email ,a.phone from account a left join win w on a.uuid = w.uuid left join event e on e.event_id = w.event_id where e.event_id = #{event_id};
select a.email ,a.phone from account a left join participation p on a.uuid = p.uuid left join event e on e.event_id = p.event_id where e.event_id = #{event_id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `search` (word, hit) VALUES (#{word}, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE hit = hit + 1;
